abstract: Head of France's spy agency Bernard Squarcini faces further investigation on charges that he broke press freedom laws by obtaining records of reporter's calls in order to unmask government mole.
snippet: The head of the state counterespionage agency faces further investigation on charges that he broke press freedom laws by obtaining records of a reporter’s calls.
lead_paragraph: The head of the state counterespionage agency faces further investigation on charges that he broke press freedom laws by obtaining records of a reporter’s calls.

headline.main: France: Spy Agency Chief Faces Inquiry
headline.print_headline: France: Spy Agency Chief Faces Inquiry
headline.seo: Head of French Spy Agency Faces Inquiry
